title: [娱乐][汉化]HotbarPets——便携宠物，为你的粘液科技服增加一个船新玩法吧！[1.12...
author: 小张up
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小张up 于 2020-4-10 22:48 编辑 
                                      HotbarPets
                                  让你的粘液科技服拥有宠物吧！


作者原话:
HotbarPets is a Slimefun Addon giving you the chance to
have Pets you can carry around in your Hotbar.
All pets have a certain "Special Ability" such as Fire Resistance,
Saturation or even Regeneration.
But be careful: If you don't feed your Pets, they will get upset!


Now, you might be thinking: Oh, this sounds similiar to InventoryPets?
Indeed, this Plugin is heavily inspired by the famous Mod InventoryPets by Purplicious_Cow
(That is also the Reason why there is a Purplicious Cow Pet ;D )


Pets can also varie from normal Minecraft Animals up to
Hostile Minecraft Mobs and even "special" Pets referring to
some people on the Internet.


简要翻译:
HotbarPets是Slimefun插件，他会在粘液科技里添加亿些新的宠物！
所有宠物都有一定的“特殊能力”，例如让玩家免疫火焰伤害等等
其他宠物一样，你必须准备好充足的食物来喂养他们



宠物也可以从正常的Minecraft动物变化到
敌对的Minecraft怪物，甚至是“特殊”宠物

[本插件会为你的粘液科技增加21个宠物，你需要自己筛选一下~]


增加的物品
Farm Animals (Peaceful)PigChickenMooshroomCow
Animals (Peaceful)SquidFish
Mob (Passive)Iron GolemSlime
Mob (Hostile)SpiderEndermanCreeperMagma CubeBlaze
Boss Mob (Hostile)Wither
Utility (Peaceful)BedEnder ChestWorkbench
SpecialPurplicious_CowmrCookieSlimeEyamazWalshrus (bwfcwalshy)

注：插件已经被我完全汉化，如果有问题请以回复形式反馈！
命令&权限
没有命令，也没有权限！


配置
很简单，请自行研究！


Bug暂无发现，如果有请回复本帖来告知作者
